name: La Luna (Haobin Zhang)
description:
This is the final game of group 48 for ARTG&CMPM 120.

Click and drag the broomstick to sweep the stars.

Press S to stop stars from moving. (Could be use after 6 second)

Press D to cancel the physics between stars. (Could be use for the next round if you pass this round)

Press Q to go to the next round.

If S, Q are not working, reload the page!!!
